characters.name: Max Caulfield
characters.description: A photography student who discovers she has the ability to turn back time.

characters.name: Chloe Price
characters.description: Max's best friend, a rebellious teenager struggling with loss and abandonment.

characters.name: Rachel Amber
characters.description: A popular student at Blackwell Academy who mysteriously disappears, sparking the events of the story.

characters.name: Sean Diaz
characters.description: A teenager forced to flee with his younger brother after a tragic event.

characters.name: Daniel Diaz
characters.description: Sean's younger brother who possesses telekinetic powers.

characters.name: Alex Chen
characters.description: A young woman with the supernatural ability to experience, absorb, and manipulate others' emotions.

characters.name: Kate Marsh
characters.description: A devout and kind student at Blackwell Academy who becomes the target of bullying.

characters.name: Victoria Chase
characters.description: A popular and wealthy student at Blackwell Academy known for her competitive and mean-spirited nature.

characters.name: Nathan Prescott
characters.description: A troubled student from a wealthy family who hides dark secrets.

characters.name: Mark Jefferson
characters.description: A famous photographer and teacher at Blackwell Academy who plays a significant role in the story's dark turns.

characters.name: David Madsen
characters.description: Chloe Price's stepfather, a security officer with a strict, authoritarian demeanor.

characters.name: Joyce Price
characters.description: Chloe's caring and hard-working mother, who tries to keep her family together.

characters.name: Frank Bowers
characters.description: A local drug dealer with connections to several characters in the story.

characters.name: Warren Graham
characters.description: A geeky and kind student at Blackwell Academy who has a crush on Max.

characters.name: Steph Gingrich
characters.description: A character who loves tabletop games and plays a significant role in *Before the Storm* and *True Colors*.

characters.name: Eliot Hampden
characters.description: A student at Blackwell Academy who has an unrequited crush on Chloe.

characters.name: Samuel Taylor
characters.description: The eccentric and mysterious janitor at Blackwell Academy.

characters.name: Mikey North
characters.description: Steph's younger brother and a friend of Chloe, who is passionate about tabletop games.

characters.name: Sera Gearhart
characters.description: Rachel Amber's biological mother who has a troubled past.

characters.name: Cassidy
characters.description: A free-spirited traveler who Sean Diaz meets during his journey in *Life is Strange 2*.

characters.name: Finn
characters.description: A charismatic and adventurous member of a group of drifters Sean encounters.

characters.name: Brody Holloway
characters.description: A blogger and wanderer who helps Sean and Daniel escape the authorities.

characters.name: Lyla Park
characters.description: Sean's best friend who provides emotional support during the early parts of *Life is Strange 2*.

characters.name: Esteban Diaz
characters.description: Sean and Daniel's father, whose death triggers the events of *Life is Strange 2*.

characters.name: Gabe Chen
characters.description: Alex Chen's older brother whose mysterious death becomes central to *Life is Strange: True Colors*.

characters.name: Eleanor Lethe
characters.description: A florist in Haven Springs and the grandmother of Riley, who struggles with memory loss.

characters.name: Ryan Lucan
characters.description: A park ranger and close friend of Gabe Chen in *True Colors*.

characters.name: Charlotte Harmon
characters.description: A sculptor and the mother of Gabe's stepson Ethan in *True Colors*.

characters.name: Ethan Lambert
characters.description: Charlotte's son who accidentally sets off the events that lead to Gabe's death in *True Colors*.

characters.name: Diane Jacobs
characters.description: An employee of Typhon, the company responsible for the disaster in *True Colors*.

locals.name: Arcadia Bay
locals.description: A small coastal town in Oregon where the story of Life is Strange takes place, filled with mystery and nostalgia.

locals.name: Blackwell Academy
locals.description: A prestigious private school known for its photography program, attended by Max Caulfield.

locals.name: Two Whales Diner
locals.description: A classic diner in Arcadia Bay run by Joyce Price, and a common meeting spot for Chloe and Max.

locals.name: Chloe's House
locals.description: The home of Chloe Price and her family, where many important conversations and events take place.

locals.name: The Junkyard
locals.description: An abandoned junkyard where Chloe and Rachel used to hang out, later visited by Max and Chloe.

locals.name: The Lighthouse
locals.description: A key location on the cliffs overlooking Arcadia Bay, which appears in Max's visions throughout the game.

locals.name: Prescott Dormitories
locals.description: The student dormitories at Blackwell Academy, where Max and many other students live.

locals.name: Rachel Amber's Hideout
locals.description: A secret place where Chloe and Rachel used to meet, which holds many clues to Rachel's disappearance.

locals.name: Haven Springs
locals.description: A picturesque town in the mountains of Colorado where Alex Chen moves to start a new life in Life is Strange: True Colors.

locals.name: The Silver Dragon
locals.description: A dispensary in Haven Springs run by Charlotte Harmon, where Alex interacts with several characters.

locals.name: The Lantern
locals.description: The local bar in Haven Springs, owned by Jed Lucan, where Alex works as a bartender.

locals.name: Diaz House
locals.description: The home of Sean and Daniel Diaz, featured at the beginning of Life is Strange 2 before their journey begins.

locals.name: Mountainside Camp
locals.description: A remote camping site where Sean and Daniel rest during their journey in Life is Strange 2.

locals.name: Merrill's Farm
locals.description: An illegal marijuana farm where Sean and Daniel work to make money during their travels.

locals.name: Away Camp
locals.description: A campsite that serves as a temporary refuge for Sean and his group of friends in Life is Strange 2.

locals.name: The Mine
locals.description: An abandoned mine near Haven Springs that plays a key role in uncovering the truth behind Gabe's death in True Colors.

locals.name: Lake of the Springs
locals.description: A peaceful lake located near Haven Springs, often visited by Alex for moments of reflection.

locals.name: Karen's Desert House
locals.description: The secluded house in the desert where Sean and Daniel reunite with their estranged mother, Karen, in Life is Strange 2.

locals.name: Puerto Lobos
locals.description: The town in Mexico where Sean and Daniel hope to escape to during their journey in Life is Strange 2.

locals.name: Typhon HQ
locals.description: The corporate headquarters of Typhon Mining, the company responsible for a disaster in Haven Springs in True Colors.

chapters.name: Chapter 1: Chrysalis
key_events: Max discovers her power to turn back time
Reunites with Chloe
Nathan and Kate's confrontation

chapters.name: Chapter 2: Out of Time
key_events: Max tries to prevent Kate's suicide
Max and Chloe investigate the missing Rachel Amber
Max has visions of the tornado approaching Arcadia Bay

chapters.name: Chapter 3: Chaos Theory
key_events: Max and Chloe break into Blackwell Academy at night
Max learns more about Rachel's disappearance
Max changes the timeline, altering Chloe's fate

chapters.name: Chapter 4: Dark Room
key_events: Max uncovers dark secrets about Blackwell and Arcadia Bay
Max and Chloe discover Rachel Amber's fate
The revelation of the 'Dark Room'

chapters.name: Chapter 5: Polarized
key_events: Max faces the consequences of her time-travel powers
Max is captured and trapped in the Dark Room
The final decision: Save Chloe or Arcadia Bay

chapters.name: Episode 1: Roads (Life is Strange 2)
key_events: Sean and Daniel Diaz's journey begins
The brothers flee after a tragedy in Seattle
Daniel's powers are revealed

chapters.name: Episode 2: Rules (Life is Strange 2)
key_events: Sean and Daniel meet their grandparents
Daniel struggles to control his powers
Encounter with Chris from Captain Spirit

chapters.name: Episode 3: Wastelands (Life is Strange 2)
key_events: Sean and Daniel work on a marijuana farm
Tensions rise between the brothers
A heist goes wrong, resulting in major consequences

chapters.name: Episode 4: Faith (Life is Strange 2)
key_events: Sean searches for Daniel in the Nevada desert
Sean confronts a religious cult
The brothers reunite but face more difficult choices

chapters.name: Episode 5: Wolves (Life is Strange 2)
key_events: Sean and Daniel reach the Mexican border
The brothers must decide their future
Multiple possible endings depending on player choices

chapters.name: Chapter 1: Side A (Life is Strange: True Colors)
key_events: Alex Chen arrives in Haven Springs
Alex reunites with her brother Gabe
Gabe's sudden death shocks Alex

chapters.name: Chapter 2: Lanterns (Life is Strange: True Colors)
key_events: Alex investigates Gabe's death
Alex's empathy powers grow stronger
A festival brings the town together

chapters.name: Chapter 3: Monster or Mortal (Life is Strange: True Colors)
key_events: Alex continues to unravel the mystery behind Gabe's death
Confrontations with Typhon Mining intensify
Alex learns more about the hidden dangers in Haven Springs

chapters.name: Chapter 4: Flicker (Life is Strange: True Colors)
key_events: Alex confronts key figures in Haven Springs
More secrets about Typhon Mining come to light
Alex experiences intense emotional revelations

chapters.name: Chapter 5: Side B (Life is Strange: True Colors)
key_events: Alex faces the ultimate decision about her future
The truth behind Gabe's death is fully revealed
Multiple possible endings based on player choices

relationships.name: Max Caulfield e Chloe Price
relationships.description: Best childhood friends who reconnect after years.
key_moments: Reunion after years
Sharing secrets
Support during difficult times
Max helping Chloe through her struggles

relationships.name: Max Caulfield e Warren Graham
relationships.description: Max’s classmate who has a crush on her and supports her throughout the game.
key_moments: Warren asking Max out for a movie date
Warren protecting Max from Nathan
Their bond growing as Max relies on him

relationships.name: Chloe Price e Rachel Amber
relationships.description: Chloe's best friend and possible romantic interest before Rachel’s disappearance.
key_moments: Chloe’s obsession with finding Rachel
Their time together before Rachel’s disappearance
Chloe’s deep emotional connection to Rachel

relationships.name: Max Caulfield e Kate Marsh
relationships.description: Max becomes a close friend to Kate, especially during her time of crisis.
key_moments: Max saving Kate from bullying
Max trying to stop Kate from jumping off the roof
Their bond deepening after Max's intervention

relationships.name: Chloe Price e David Madsen
relationships.description: Chloe's difficult relationship with her stepfather, David.
key_moments: Chloe's rebellion against David’s rules
David's attempts to control Chloe’s behavior
Tensions during arguments about Chloe’s lifestyle

relationships.name: Nathan Prescott e Victoria Chase
relationships.description: Victoria and Nathan maintain a friendship with hints of manipulation.
key_moments: Victoria supporting Nathan despite his behavior
Their involvement in the Dark Room
The complex dynamic between them and Max

relationships.name: Sean Diaz e Daniel Diaz
relationships.description: The strong brotherly bond between Sean and Daniel as they navigate hardships together.
key_moments: Sean protecting Daniel during their journey
Daniel learning to control his powers
Their relationship evolving through difficult choices

relationships.name: Sean Diaz e Cassidy
relationships.description: A close friendship between Sean and Cassidy, with the potential for romance.
key_moments: Their connection growing while working on the farm
Sean and Cassidy sharing intimate moments
Cassidy encouraging Sean’s freedom and individuality

relationships.name: Alex Chen e Gabe Chen
relationships.description: Alex and Gabe share a close sibling bond despite years apart.
key_moments: Alex reuniting with Gabe in Haven Springs
Gabe helping Alex settle into the town
Gabe’s tragic death impacting Alex deeply

relationships.name: Alex Chen e Steph Gingrich
relationships.description: Steph and Alex share a deep friendship with the possibility of romance.
key_moments: Steph supporting Alex during emotional times
Their connection through shared interests in music
Romantic moments depending on player choices

relationships.name: Alex Chen e Ryan Lucan
relationships.description: Ryan becomes a close friend and possible love interest for Alex.
key_moments: Ryan comforting Alex after Gabe's death
Their bond strengthening during the investigation
Romantic tension depending on player decisions

relationships.name: Daniel Diaz e Chris Eriksen
relationships.description: Daniel forms a strong bond with Chris, the boy next door who imagines himself as a superhero.
key_moments: Daniel and Chris playing together as superheroes
Chris teaching Daniel about imagination and bravery
Their bond growing despite the challenges they face
